creator: yilong.li@runtimeverification.com

text: Since TaskQueue extends LinkedBlockingQueue, I think it should be thread-safe internally.
creator: yilong.li@runtimeverification.com

text: Fixed in trunk and 8.0.x for 8.0.27 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
